//Ragnus//

  Ragnus pauses before his next strike, using the other bot's 
hesitation to remove a seond cylinder, that is his second sword, yet 
he doesn't ignite it.

  He hovers before Shivah, "A am the Great Red.  Lesser beings call 
me Ragnus.  And my status..." he gives an insane smile, "...I am the 
executioner."

> Shivah::
> 
> Shivah moved and avoided the strike "ALtought I see you before" 
said 
> Bravely the male "Told me your name and rank, I just fight with 
> Enemies who have the same or high rank than me...!!!"
